channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Temporary Traffic Lights stuck on red, 30th August
item.description:
Road repairs on junction of Bushell Way and White Horse Hill means there are temporary traffic lights. These lights are now apparently stuck on red
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, White Horse Hill, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Dead fox, 30th August
item.description:
A dead fox in a bad state is by the entrance of the Peregrine Court flats. I see this was raised before, with a member of the public moving it out of the way of the main road but it is still there by the entrance on the main road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peregrine Court, East Wickham, London

item.title: Blocked river under bride, 30th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berwick Crescent, Falconwood, London
